```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(rmdformats)

## Global options
options(max.print="75")
opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE,

               cache_rebuild=TRUE,
               prompt=FALSE,
               tidy=TRUE,
               comment=NA,
               message=FALSE,
               warning=FALSE,
               echo=FALSE
               )
opts_knit$set(width=125)
```
